channel.title: Y the Long Face on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Y the Long Face on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: It Looks Like the Tesla Model Y Refresh Has Bombed
item.description: The high-selling Model Y is crucial for both Elon Musk and Tesla, but a half-hearted reskin of the car hasn’t reversed the company’s sales woes. Would a complete overhaul have been a better bet?
